00031 #ifndef _MYCLOCK_H_
00032 #define _MYCLOCK_H_
00033 
00034 #include <time.h>
00035 class MyClock {
00036   //long    i = 600000L;
00037   clock_t start, finish;
00038   double  duration;
00039   
00040 public:
00041   MyClock(){start = clock();}
00042   ~MyClock(){};
00043   double getInterval() {
00044     finish = clock(); 
00045     duration = (double)(finish - start) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00046     start = finish;
00047     return duration;
00048   }
00049 };
00050 
00051 #endif
